content.question: Which of the following pairs of European rulers is generally identified as "enlightened" monarchs?

choices.label: Anne of England and Louis XV
Joseph II and Catherine the Great
Frederick William I and George III
Peter the Great and Catherine de Medicis

content.answer: Joseph II and Catherine the Great

topic.text: 4.6: Enlightened and Other Approaches to Power

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
